category.name: Thin Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDVThinClientBomlinePropsDisplay
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of BOM Line properties to be used for displaying BOM Lines in the Design Context Web client. Valid values are all valid BOM Line properties and Occurrence Notes. The property bl_ia_name is always displayed as the last column and hence not added in the property list.
